bibl.title: Review Article: Comedy.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: J. Rusten (Ed.), The Birth of Comedy: Texts, Documents and Art from Athenian Comic Competitions (Baltimore, 2011); - Ian C. Storey (Edited and Translated by), Fragments of Old Comedy. Volume III. Philonicus to Xenophon. Adespota = The Loeb Classical Library. 515 (Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2011). - [Introduction.] - 1. Periodization and variety. - 2. The competitive environment. - 3. The comic body. - 4. Where do we go from here? - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Ian A. Ruffell, Review Article: Comedy.
